WRITING.TITLE: Who I want to main in Injustice 2
WRITING.TEXT:
This may be ambitious but here's the list of characters I wanna main in Injustice 2: Robin/Nightwing Batman Green Arrow Deadshot Blue Beetle Captain Cold
I realize Nightwing isn't in it, but you can get him through gear and a trait
Non speedsters maybe can have time remnants, I mean, the rules are pretty lax seen as the writers never explained it
